anya-e0810n0:3_0: Yassa ñāṇaṁ sadā ñāṇaṁ, nāññeyyā ñāṇakaṁ vinā;
anya-e0810n0:8_0: [Ka] idhāyaṁ ganthakāro paṭhamamattano paresampi sammā hitatthanipphādanatthaṁ puññasampada’mācinoti “tathāgato”ccādinā.
anya-e0810n0:8_1: Tattha karuṇākaro mahākaruṇāya uppattiṭṭhānabhūto yo tathāgato bhagavā karopayātaṁ attano hatthagataṁ
anya-e0810n0:8_2: sukhappadaṁ sukhassa patiṭṭhānabhūtaṁ sukhakāraṇaṁ vā sukhadāyakaṁ vā padaṁ nibbānaṁ osajja cajitvā kalisambhave
anya-e0810n0:8_3: dukkhakāraṇabhūte bhave saṁsāre kevaladukkaraṁ sukarenāsammissaṁ accantadukkaraṁ pañcavidhapariccāgādikaṁ
anya-e0810n0:8_4: karaṁ karonto paratthaṁ paresamatthaṁyeva akā katavā,
anya-e0810n0:9_0: [Kha] yañca dhammaṁ jarārujādimuttā jarārogādīhi vimuttā munikuñjarā muniseṭṭhā bhagavanto apūjayuṁ pūjitavanto,
anya-e0810n0:9_1: tathā uttare uttame sattānaṁ vā saṁsāramahoghapakkhandānaṁ tato uttaraṇasamatthe yahiṁ tare yasmiṁ dhammaplave
anya-e0810n0:9_2: ṭhitā sammāpaṭipajjanavasena ārūḷhā narānarā manussā ca devā ca tivaṭṭambunidhiṁ kilesakammavipākavaṭṭasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0810n0:9_3: tīhi vaṭṭehi ākulitaṁ saṁsāramahamburāsiṁ tariṁsu tiṇṇā,
anya-e0810n0:9_5: saṁsāradukkhappahānakaraṁ vā taṁ dhammamapi ahaṁ namāmi.
anya-e0810n0:10_0: [Ga] munindorasasūnutaṁ bhagavato ure sambhavadhammadesanāya ariyabhāvappattatāya munindassa orasaputtabhāvaṁ
anya-e0810n0:10_1: gataṁ pattaṁ nutaṁ kilesakhepanakaṁ supuññakhettaṁ puññatthikānaṁ puññabījaviruhanaṭṭhānaṁ sukhettabhūtaṁ
anya-e0810n0:10_3: sutadharaṁ vā kilesasavanābhāvena assutaṁ apāṇopi pāṇo karīyitthāti pāṇīkato,
anya-e0810n0:10_10: Sadā sabbasmiṁ kāle guṇoghena sīlādiguṇasamūhena nirantarantaraṁ avicchinnamānasaṁ,
anya-e0810n0:10_11: paripuṇṇacittaṁ vā gaṇampi aṭṭhannaṁ ariyapuggalānaṁ samūhaṁ api ahaṁ namāmīti evamettha tiṇṇampi saṅkhepato atthayojanā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0810n0:11_2: liṅgavasena ca paridīpanato pakāsanato “abhidhānappadīpika”nti laddhanāmaṁ satthaṁ pakāsissaṁ antobhāvena nipphannaṁ bahibhāvena pakāsissaṁ.
anya-e0810n0:11_7: Etena santesvapi pubbācariyānaṁ satthesu yasmā na tesu nāmaliṅgāni buddhavacanānurūpāni honti,
anya-e0810n0:11_8: tasmā tadanurūpāni nāmaliṅgāni dassayanto abhidhānasatthaṁ pakāsissāmīti etamatthaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0810n0:11_14: Kimetassa abhidhānasatthassa karaṇe payojananti pucchāyaṁ yasmiṁ sati taṁ sotāro sotumussahanti,
anya-e0810n0:11_19: tesaṁ pāṭavatthīnaṁ sotūnaṁ nāmaliṅgesu kosallaṁ kusalatā chekabhāvo buddhavacane mahabbalaṁ atthassa nicchayakāraṇaṁ hoti,
anya-e0810n0:11_20: ato tasmā kāraṇā buddhabhāsitassārahāni nāmaliṅgāni dassayanto abhidhānappadīpikaṁ satthaṁ pakāsissanti sambandho.
anya-e0810n0:12_1: Bhiyyo bāhullena rūpantarā rūpabhedena itthipaccayapumbhāvādikāriyakatena thīpunnapuṁsakaṁ ñeyyaṁ,
anya-e0810n0:12_6: Asi khaggo ca sāyako abhidhāna 391 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:12_18: Āpo payo jalaṁ vāri abhidhāna 661 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:12_19: Marījhādayo hyabhinnarūpattā liṅgantarepi sambhāviyantehi niyataliṅgehi migataṇhikābhākarajalādisaddehi sāhacariyena taṁliṅge nicchīyante.
anya-e0810n0:12_20: Āhaccavidhānena itthipumanapuṁsakānaṁ visesetvā kathanena thīpunnapuṁsakaṁ ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0810n0:12_21: Kvacīti yatra na rūpabhedo liṅganiṇṇayassa nimittaṁ,
anya-e0810n0:13_0: [Cha] idāni rūpabhedoti liṅganiṇṇayassa paṭipattihetuko yo bhinnaliṅgānaṁ dvando,
anya-e0810n0:13_10: Nanu ca bhinnaliṅgānampi ekaseso kato, yathā –
anya-e0810n0:13_15: Ettha hi mātā ca pitā ca pitaro,
anya-e0810n0:13_18: bhātā ca bhaginī ca bhātaroti bhinnaliṅgānampi ekaseso dassitoti.
anya-e0810n0:13_19: Ṭhānantare tesaṁ bhinnaliṅgatāya dassitattā na doso.
anya-e0810n0:13_20: Tāto tu janako pitā abhidhāna 243 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:13_26: Sasuroti iccādikañhi tesaṁ abhidhāna 246 gāthā ṭhānantaranti.
anya-e0810n0:13_27: Tathā ettha kamaṁ vinā bhinnaliṅgānaṁ gaṇanapāṭho viya saṅkaropi na kato.
anya-e0810n0:13_28: Tatra hi saggadisādayo atthā yathākkamaṁ taṁsambandhā ca sakkavidisādayo atthā sakasakasambandhasahitā yathābhidhānaṁ sarūpapaṭipatyamatthabhidheyyā,
anya-e0810n0:13_30: tāni sabbāni tadabhidhānāvasare abhidheyyānīti sukhenekatreva sakalanāmapaṭipatti sarūpapaṭipatti ca yathā siyāticcetadatthaṁ kamo abhyupagamyate,
anya-e0810n0:13_32: harādyavasare kumārādayo abhidheyyā iti kamānurodhena liṅgasaṅkaro pariharitumasakkuṇeyyo,
anya-e0810n0:13_33: yathāvuttantu kamaṁ vinā neha saṅkaro kato,
anya-e0810n0:16_1: Gāthāpādantamajjhaṭṭhā gāthānaṁ pādānañca antamajjhaṭṭhā liṅgavācakā anekatthaliṅgavācakāni ñāṇadassanādīni
anya-e0810n0:16_3: Apare gāthāpādānamādiṭṭhā liṅgavācakā paramatthaṁ yanti gacchanti.
anya-e0810n0:21_0: Khagge kurūre nettiṁso, parasmiñcātra tīsvamuabhidhāna 1089 gāthā;
anya-e0810n0:22_0: Kusale sukataṁ suṭṭhu-kate ca sukato tisu abhidhāna 938 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:23_0: Samayo samavāye ca, samūhe kāraṇe khaṇe;
anya-e0810n0:24_0: Paṭivedhe siyā kāle, pahāne lābhadiṭṭhisu abhidhāna 778 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:28_0: Daḷhatthenatireke cā-navasesamhi taṁ tisu abhidhāna 786 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:30_0: Jaḷe thūlo mahatyapi abhidhāna 1066 gāthā ccādīsu
anya-e0810n0:31_1: pādantamajjhaṭṭhānañca liṅgavācakānaṁ pubbaparatthesvapi gamanabhāvato “pubbaṁ yantī”ti idaṁ yebhuyyavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0810n0:31_2: Atha vā gāthānaṁ majjhantaṭṭhā pubbaṁ yanti,
anya-e0810n0:31_4: pādantamajjhaṭṭhā ca pubbāparañca yantīti yathālābhayojanā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0810n0:32_4: sattannaṁ pūraṇe seṭṭhe’tisante sattamo tisu abhidhāna 942 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:32_5: Ettha ca nisiddhaliṅganāmaṁ pārisesato “sesaliṅga”nti ñeyyaṁ nisiddhaliṅga sesatthaṁ (amara 1.5.), yathā –
anya-e0810n0:33_3: atha ādi yassa abhidhānassāti idaṁ abhidhānadvayañca ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0810n0:33_4: Tvantamathādikaṁ nāmādipadaṁ pubbena na sambajjhateti bhāvo.
anya-e0810n0:33_6: jino sakko tu siddhattho abhidhāna 4 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:33_10: pume tu paṇhi pāsaṇi abhidhāna 277 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:33_11: Pume tūtu rajo pupphaṁ abhidhāna 238 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:33_15: udare tu tathā pācā’nalasmiṁ gahaṇītthiyaṁ abhidhāna 973 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:33_20: Athasaddena catra anantariyatthena sakapariyāyopalakkhaṇato atho saddādīsu ca na pubbena sambajjhate.
anya-e0810n0:33_21: Pāṇako cāpyatho uccāliṅgo lomasapāṇakoti abhidhāna 623 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:34_0: [Jha] idāni buddhavacanānamanurūpānampi pacurappayogānameva kesañci gahaṇaṁ attano satthantarāpasayhatāvasena
anya-e0810n0:34_3: tañhi āgacchanti tividhasampattiyo etenāti āgamoti vuccati.
anya-e0810n0:34_4: Tasmiṁ bhiyyo payogaṁ bāhullena payujjateti payogo,
anya-e0810n0:34_5: taṁ āgamma gahetvā kvaci araññavaggādīsu nighaṇṭuyuttiñca nighaṇṭunāmake satthe āgataṁ buddhavacanānurūpaṁ
anya-e0810n0:34_6: yuttiñca ānīya ānetvā nāmaliṅgaṁ kathīyati antobhāvena nipphannaṁ bahibhāvena pakāsīyate.
anya-e0810n0:34_8: Āsīsāyaṁ vā avassambhāvinopi vacanassa vattamānatthavatticchāya vattamānattaṁ,
anya-e0810n0:34_9: tathā hi loke avassambhāvino siddhimabhisandhāya bhāvinamappattaṁ vattamānattena vā atītattena vā vattumicchati,
anya-e0810n0:34_11: “idaṁ mamamapāpaye”ti koci kenacābhihito santo avassaṁ taṁ bhavissatīti maññamāno pāpiyamānaṁ pattaṁ vā vattumicchati,
anya-e0810n0:34_12: tatoyeva “āsīsāyaṁ bhūtamiva ce”ti pāṇini 3.3.132 tadatidesavacanaṁ paccākhyāyate.
